subject: Order No. #SSN1776
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I received my order (Order No. #SSN1776), which came with the pro x pedals but it did not bring the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors (haptic reactor) that I had ordered and allegedly shipped. 

Could you please provide me with an update as to this. 

Thank you,
Luis D. Prieto 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Luis Prieto,  The second batch of motors will start arriving this Saturday. Once we receive the motor cores from our supplier, we’ll immediately arrange express shipping for you. The delivery will also be very fast—please rest assured!
